Item.desc: Only affects not-fully-evolved Pokemon of a single family, decided when the Eviolite is made. Grants a +5 Bonus to two different Stats, after Combat Stages, decided when the Eviolite is made. Prevents Pokemon from evolving when held. Cannot be used by Trainers.
Whenever the user faints, roll 1d20. Once a Scene on a result of 16+, the holder does not faint, and is left with 1 Hit Point. Accessory Item for Trainers.
Once a Scene, if damage from a Move would take Focus Sash's holder's Hit Points from Max to 0 or less, Focus Sash's holder instead has 1 Hit Point remaining. Accessory Item for Trainers.

Comes with a remote activator, which when pressed, causes the Pokemon or Trainer wearing the shock collar to lose Hit Points equal to 1/6th of their Max Hit Points. This may be used to activate the �Press� Feature. This collar works on Ground-Type Pokemon.
The user adds +10 to their Initiative. Accessory Item for Trainers.
Whenever the user damages a foe, they gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, the default Stage of HP is +1 Combat Stage instead of 0. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, the default Stage of Attack is +1 Combat Stage instead of 0. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, the default Stage of Defense is +1 Combat Stage instead of 0. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, the default Stage of Special Attack +1 Combat Stage instead of 0. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, the default Stage of Special Defense +1 Combat Stage instead of 0. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, the default Stage of Speed +1 Combat Stage instead of 0. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it gives +1 for Accuracy and Evasion. Accessory Item for Trainers.
Induces Poison on holder. Off-Hand Item for Trainers. Standard Action to drop.
When held, it can be consumed as a Free Action to give a +3 Damage Base bonus to one attack of the Bug-Type. Off-hand or Accessory Slot Item for Trainers

When held, it act as both a Dragon Fang and a Draco Brace. Accessory Slot Item for Trainers.
When held, it act as both a Black Glasses and a Dread Brace. Accessory Slot Item for Trainers.
When held, it act as both a Soft Sand and an Earth Brace. Accessory Slot Item for Trainers.

When held by an untransformed Ditto, increases both Defense and Special Defense by +2 Combat Stages. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held by a Farfetch'd, this rare Leek increase the holder's critical range by 2. Rare Leeks are Wielded. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held by a Cubone or Marowak, this rare, dense bone grants the Pure Power Ability. Thick Clubs are Wielded. Cannot be used by Trainers.
Acts as a Psychic Type Booster. If held by a Spoink, it also acts as a Special Attack Stat Booster.
Raise the user's HP Base Stat 1.
Raise the user's Attack Base Stat 1.
Raise the user's Defense Base Stat 1.
Raise the user's Special Attack Base Stat 1.
Raise the user's Special Defense Base Stat 1.
Raise the user's Speed Base Stat 1.
The Pokemon gains 2 Tutor Points. Use only one per Pokemon.
Raise one of the user's Move's Frequency one level. Use only one per Pokemon.
The user loses 5 HP, and gains +1 Combat Stage in a random Stat.
The user becomes Poisoned; if they do, they gain +1 Combat Stage in two random Stats.
The user is cured of Burn, Paralysis, or Poison. If they are, they lose 1 Combat Stage in a random Stat.
